name: Honey I'm Home
description:
Play in Browser:

http://mywebspace.quinnipiac.edu/ccurso/Personal/Honey%20I'm%20Home/

This game was made for the Global Game Jam around the theme, What Home Means to You.  Honey I'm Home is a game about the day to day life. The main character embarks on an adventure of ordinary tasks until he can return home. The true meaning of home is explained in this title. 

All Art, Music, and Code was created by Casey Urso.
